![Deanne B. McPherson](/instructors/mcpherson.jpg){: width="180px"} Deanne B. McPherson: PhD Candidate, Pennsylvania State University

Deanne is a PhD candidate in Industrial Engineering and Operations Research at Penn State University.
In addition to focusing her research in the area of big data anaylis on social networks. In addition to being a student, she works as a graduate researcher at the Applied Research Laboratory with emphasis on long range shipyard capacity planning.

Prior to returning to school, she spent 11 years as an active duty US Naval Officer and now currently serves as a reserve officer supporting the Office of Naval Research.
